channel.title: I cannot overwrite torrc file
channel.description:
I cannot save to torrc file. I keep getting the warning:
A problem occured when saving the output. Access denied. Could not write to /etc/tor/torrc.part.
I haven't tampered with permissions and checking them shows that the file is on read and write.
What to do?

item.title: I cannot overwrite torrc file
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You need root rights to do this.

Start Menu -> Applications -> Settings -> /etc/tor/torrc

Or.

Read full topic
